title: HorrorGame1 SoundEffect
longDescription:
🎧️YoutubePreview


📖Overview.

The HorrorGame1 SoundEffects Pack is a collection of audio effects suitable for use in horror, dungeon, slasher, and similar genres in games, films, and animation projects. This pack includes sound effects from various categories such as achievements, background noise, chains, chests, coins, collection, crafting, creatures, doors, equipment, gore, jump scares, monsters, traps, and more. The audio files are provided in both stereo and mono formats, allowing for flexible use as UI sound effects or game-specific positional audio.



🕹️Functionality.

  • Variety of Sound Effects: This pack offers a wide range of sound effects ideal for creating intense and gory audio experiences in genres like horror, dungeon, and slasher.
  • Stereo and Mono Files: The audio files are available in both stereo and mono formats, providing the option to use them as UI sound effects or game-specific positional audio.
  • Multi-Purpose Use: These sound effects are suitable for a variety of projects, including games, films, animations, and more, enhancing the realism and intensity of violent and gory scenes.

⭐5STAR Review.

  • If you like the product, please leave a 5-star review! We always have a great communication with our customers. :D
  • Even if you don't have the sound you want, please leave a 5-star review and feedback! We will check the customer's review every two weeks and fill in the sound as possible every two weeks! We will also give you a relevant reply if your opinion is reflected :D


♬CopyrightFreeMusic Playlist

We provide copyright-free music (CC0) content that can be used in various fields such as games, movies, animations, YouTube, etc., to ensure the success of your projects. Please check out our YouTube channel playlist through the link below! All the music tracks have been composed and produced by us directly. Therefore, we can guarantee that they are very safe from copyright issues.
